name: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
summary: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch is an interactive movie in the Black Mirror series, produced by Netflix. The movie has a playable interface with which the player choose some of the character's actions and end up with different endings based on your choices. The plot talks about a young man trying to be a game developer in the ZX Spectrum era, while gets around the inner functioning of the scene and tries to survive the choices the player makes.
